limericks.author: Gregory House
limericks.text:
I’ve moved past threesomes. I’m now into foursomes.
If someone backs out, then you’ve still got a threesome.
If two people back out, you’re still having sex.

limericks.author: Unknown
limericks.text: When life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.

limericks.author: Jimmy Carr
limericks.text: My girlfriend used to smoke after sex, so we started using lube.

limericks.author: Larry David
limericks.text: I had a wonderful childhood, which is tough because it’s hard to adjust to a miserable adulthood.
